"Yea, I heard Finns are violent.":http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-1341100/The-violent-gene-Genetic-mutation-Finnish-men-makes-fight.html

Although... people who dwell in mountains or highlands tend to also have these genes. hence why they are often warrior castes in societies. Like the Scotts, and the area of the south where Scotts settled that constitutes America's soldiers (especially frontline and special forces)

topics.body:
It's only ever gotten up to 128F (53C) here in my state, I can't imagine ~132F (55-56C) yet

Although it has gotten up to 134F (57C) in Death Valley, California before, but then again it has reached _*136F*_ (58C) in Libya, so the East beats us in that too
